articles.title: David Warner posts PV Sindhu's photo after her CWG gold, wife Candice reacts - Hindustan Times
articles.description: David Warner posted a photograph of India's PV Sindhu after she won Commonwealth Games gold in badminton women's singles. The Australia opener's wife Candice took note of it and reacted on the Instagram post.
articles.content: PV Sindhu is not only one of the best (if not the best) Indian shuttlers but also one of the most prominent sportspersons globally. The world number seven earned plaudits from across the globe after … [+1476 chars]
